h2_title: Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
content: The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill in Chapter 2 is hidden deep within the Crouching Tiger Temple. To reach it, you must defeat both the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard to collect the Sternness of Stone and Keenness of Tiger items. Place those items in the Tally in the Crouching Tiger Temple arena to open a secret door leading to the Cellar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Jade_Lotus_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Jade Lotus Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Jade Lotus Pill'.
The content is as follows:
The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill in Chapter 2 is hidden deep within the Crouching Tiger Temple. To reach it, you must defeat both the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard to collect the Sternness of Stone and Keenness of Tiger items. Place those items in the Tally in the Crouching Tiger Temple arena to open a secret door leading to the Cellar.
